title: SMC_GroupEventLogging (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK FINAL SMC_GroupEventLogging
This FB is used to turn on event logging for axis group events.
As soon as event logging is turned on, information messages will be logged
on the actions that the axis group performs. E.g. when a movement starts and
ends or an axis or path override changes.

rows.Name: AxisGroup
rows.Comment: Reference to a group of axes

rows.Name: Enabled
rows.Comment: Signals whether axis group events are logged

rows: Signals that an error has occurred within the function block
